title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not returning the expected class
description: Bug 49235 - When calling the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet method, the output is 'MySomeAnn', but I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'. This issue is not present in Glassfish 3.0, but it occurs in Tomcat 7.0.0.
OB: When invoking the onStartup method and printing the target classes using the classSet iterator, the output is 'MySomeAnn'.
EB: However, I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'.
